awd_titl_txt: Collaborative Research on Organizational Processes in the   Production of Culture
awd_abstract_narration: This collaborative project extends and expands a research project               on organizations.  The investigators identify organizations which               transmit important political and social values, and study how those             organizations grow and decline.  They are developing a model of                 the ecology of organizations based on models of spatial diffusion               and organizational properties.  The research aids in developing a               comparative theory of culture relating culture production to                    changes in organizations, historical change, and environmental                  conditions.  In particular, PIs hope to improve understanding of                such phenomena as declining voter turnout and organizational                    failures among U.S. universities.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Social and Economic Sciences
